section.title: Quote Price List
section.para: To enter the net Unit Price for a Quote Line Item, select the browse button located to the right of the "Net Unit Price" field. The following screen will appear:
When entering the net Unit Price for a Quote Line Item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the Customer associated with the specified Quote. The name of the Customer will also be displayed.
Displays the Item Number associated with the specified Quote Line Item.
Displays Line Item quantity specified on previous screen.
Display lists available pricing for the specified Quote Line Item.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without entering a Price, returning you to the previous screen.
Highlight a Price from the list of Prices, then select this button to enter the Price in the "Net Unit Price" field on the previous screen.
